sql.if: AND TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') between start_ymd and end_ymd

mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as count FROM board WHERE 1=1

select board_id as boardId ,board_type as boardType ,title as title ,content as content ,view_count as viewCount ,start_ymd as startYmd ,end_ymd as endYmd ,status as status ,create_on as createOn ,create_by as createBy from board where board_id = ${boardId}

/** 게시판의 1개 조회*/ SELECT board_id as boardId ,board_type as boardType ,title as as title ,content as content ,view_count as viewCount ,start_ymd as startYmd ,end_ymd as endYmd ,status as status ,create_on as createOn ,create_by as createBy FROM board WHERE 1=1 AND board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.update: /** 게시판 update*/ UPDATE public.board SET board_type = #{boardType}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, view_count = #{viewCount}, start_ymd = replace(#{startYmd},'-',''), end_ymd = replace(#{endYmd},'-',''), status = COALESCE(#{status},'0') WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.board_file_match (board_id, board_file_id, seq, deleted_yn ) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{boardFileId}, #{seq}, #{deletedYn})
mapper.select: /* board_id로 tag들 리스트 조회*/ select B.tag_id as tagId ,B.name as name from board_tag_match A inner join board_tag B on A.tag_id = B.tag_id where A.board_id = #{value}

/** board_id에 소속된 BoardFile을 조회*/ select B.board_file_id AS boardFileId , B.phy_folder AS phyFolder , B.phy_name AS phyName , B.org_name AS orgName , B.mime_type AS mimeType , B.file_size AS fileSize , B.ext AS ext , B.note AS note , B.create_on AS createOn , B.create_by AS createBy from board_file_match A inner join board_file B on A.board_file_id = B.board_file_id where 1=1 and A.board_id = #{value} order by A.seq
mapper.delete: /* board_file_match 를 board_id로 삭제 */ delete from board_file_match where board_id = #{value}
/* board_tag_match 를 board_id로 삭제 */ delete from board_tag_match where board_id = #{value}
